column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: typhoon. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ty: <http://example.org/typhoon#> .ty:Typhoon rdf:type rdfs:Class .ty:hasName rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ty:Typhoon ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .ty:hasSpeed rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ty:Typhoon ;    rdfs:range xsd:integer .ty:hasCategory rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ty:Typhoon ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .ty:hasDate rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ty:Typhoon ;    rdfs:range xsd:date .ty:causedDamage rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ty:Typhoon ;    rdfs:range xsd:boolean.ty:TyphoonHaiyan rdf:type ty:Typhoon ;    ty:hasName "Super Typhoon Haiyan" ;    ty:hasSpeed 315 ;    ty:hasCategory "Category 5" ;    ty:hasDate "2013-11-07"^^xsd:date ;    ty:causedDamage true .
